```{r}
# min-max normalization
mat <- df |>
  column_to_rownames("variable") |>
  as.matrix() |>
  t()

normalize_minmax <- function(x) {
  return((x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x)))
}

mat <- apply(mat, MARGIN = 2, FUN = normalize_minmax)
```
